author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA EXPECTED TO BRING CATASTROPHIC AND LIFE-THREATENING WINDS, FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON TUESDAY...
summary: ...MELISSA EXPECTED TO BRING CATASTROPHIC AND LIFE-THREATENING WINDS, FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON TUESDAY... As of 11:00 PM EDT Mon Oct 27 the center of Melissa was located near 16.6, -78.5 with movement NNE at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 903 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 175 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA EXPECTED TO BRING CATASTROPHIC AND LIFE-THREATENING WINDS, FLOODING, AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON TUESDAY... title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
